info.author: alice
info.description:
Task Checker on Console Ver 0.2.1
---

# About this application
This application is available on the console task ** management **.

# How to use
    $ Taskcheck [option] [args]

# Options
[Contents of the task] [date format] 1. Create
[The date format [] ..] 2. List
[Number of [task] ..] 3. Delete

Made a modification of the option name at (※) Version 0.2.2.


# # Create
* Add a new task.
* Format of date is `YYYY / MM / DD`.

# # List
* Outputs a list of tasks that are currently registered.
* If you do not specify any arguments will print all the tasks.
* If you specify a date format of an argument and prints the task of that date.
* Format of date is `YYYY / MM / DD` or `YYYY / MM /`.

---

# # # Color settings
* Expiration 0 days (ie day) case of `Red`
* The deadline (ie has expired) less than or equal to zero if the `Yellow`
* Expire within three days if `Magenta`
* If the due date within one week `Cyan`
* If the due date within one month of `Green`
Other than the above are all `*` White


! [Showmode] (https://img.skitch.com/20120318-bayfhndxu9bit8ikqthm6hxk97.png)


# # Delete
* Delete the task.
* If you put a delete option, you do not specify anything in the second argument, it prints the number of tasks that currently exist.

! [Showmode] (https://img.skitch.com/20120321-psbcf99krcbpq1kf3cn5mtcigw.png)

* If you specify a number of the task in the second argument, after checking whether there is a task of that number, delete the task of that number.



# License
MIT License


---

# Change Log
# # # Version 0.2.2
Modification was the name of the option in accordance with the theory 1. CRUD.
Produced the ability to delete Task 2.
info.name: taskChecker-on-Console
info.summary: this application support management your task on console.
